The app helps users concentrate on their primary 17 tasks while minimizing distractions. At the same time, **YPS** allows 18 users to stay in control of everything they need outside of work - Chat, 19 Notes, Calendar, News and Weather. 20 21 The motivation for creating this project came from a situation I 22 encountered every day.
